page.title: 03Mobile Amenities Guilsboro'
page.content: As there are relatively few amenities in the village of Guilsborough-once quite self supporting with Bakers, Butchers, Saddler, Tailor etc. - mobile vans nowadays fill some needs as follows :-Fish and Chip van outside the Primary School 4.30pm Saturdays 4.30- 6.30 Wednesdays; Daventry Mobile Library -weekly- alternate Monday and Tuesday pm; Ken Troop-Fruit and Veg.- various stops - Monday and Friday pm; M.G.Meats-Tuesday and Friday; Midland Bank van-Tuesday mornings outside the Post Office; several Ice-Cream vans at various times; mobile clinic - monthly; laundry van collects and delivers weekly;hard- ware van fortnightly; baker's van three times per week. Thornby and Cold Ashby are also served by various mobile amenities.
